title: Diabetes mellitus: implications for nursing care.
summary: Like so many aspects of nursing, diabetes care has changed over the years. This article will look at the condition of diabetes mellitus and its implications for care and examine some of the relevant physiological mechanisms, also in relation to care....
abstract: Like so many aspects of nursing, diabetes care has changed over the years. This article will look at the condition of diabetes mellitus and its implications for care and examine some of the relevant physiological mechanisms, also in relation to care.
